headline: HUBB Q1 Earnings Call: Softer Sales, Margin Management, and Tariff Uncertainty Highlight Quarter
summary: Electrical and electronic products company Hubbell (NYSE:HUBB) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales falling 2.4% year on year to $1.37 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.50 per share was 6% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
